description.en-GB:
This Plugin adds the function known from shopware 5 to receive a preview of the regarding e-mail template that is going to be sent in the event of a status change in an order.

Additional to that, you can edit the mail or even the subject in realtime, before it is being sent to the customer. This can be done with an 'What You See Is What You Get' editor or, if preferred, directly via HTML.

You will not need any configuration after the plugin is being installed. You can start right away.
